content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal Mine at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position unknown)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown)
- Inserter (position unknown) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position unknown) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-plate is required to craft iron-gear-wheel.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when crafting without required machines
- Verify that you are using the correct crafting machine or furnace for the recipe you are trying to craft.
